Which of these describes the graph of $x^2(x+y+1)=y^2(x+y+1)$ ?\\
\\
$\textbf{(A)}\ \text{two parallel lines}$\\
$\textbf{(B)}\ \text{two intersecting lines}$\\
$\textbf{(C)}\ \text{three lines that all pass through a common point}$\\
$\textbf{(D)}\ \text{three lines that do not all pass through a common point}$\\
$\textbf{(E)}\ \text{a line and a parabola}$
